description:
A vif driver is defined as:


 21 class VIFDriver(object):
 22     """Abstract class that defines generic interfaces for all VIF drivers.""    "
 23 
 24     def plug(self, instance, network, mapping):
 25         """Plug VIF into network."""
 26         raise NotImplementedError()
 27 
 28     def unplug(self, instance, network, mapping):
 29         """Unplug VIF from network."""
 30         raise NotImplementedError()


The Xen Vif implementations do not provide this interface:

 34 class XenAPIBridgeDriver(VIFDriver):
 35     """VIF Driver for XenAPI that uses XenAPI to create Networks."""
 36 
 37     def plug(self, xenapi_session, vm_ref, instance, device, network,
 38                                                     network_mapping):


119 class XenAPIOpenVswitchDriver(VIFDriver):
120     """VIF driver for Open vSwitch with XenAPI."""
121 
122     def plug(self, xenapi_session, vm_ref, instance, device, network,

The Xen implementations should implement the driver interface as defined.
title: Xen VIF implementation breaks the interface

comments.content:
A vif driver is defined as:


 21 class VIFDriver(object):
 22     """Abstract class that defines generic interfaces for all VIF drivers.""    "
 23 
 24     def plug(self, instance, network, mapping):
 25         """Plug VIF into network."""
 26         raise NotImplementedError()
 27 
 28     def unplug(self, instance, network, mapping):
 29         """Unplug VIF from network."""
 30         raise NotImplementedError()


The Xen Vif implementations do not provide this interface:

 34 class XenAPIBridgeDriver(VIFDriver):
 35     """VIF Driver for XenAPI that uses XenAPI to create Networks."""
 36 
 37     def plug(self, xenapi_session, vm_ref, instance, device, network,
 38                                                     network_mapping):


119 class XenAPIOpenVswitchDriver(VIFDriver):
120     """VIF driver for Open vSwitch with XenAPI."""
121 
122     def plug(self, xenapi_session, vm_ref, instance, device, network,

The Xen implementations should implement the driver interface as defined.

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/2570
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/2570
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/06e5909d05321a257afe6fa3b9b440e29cea88e7
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 06e5909d05321a257afe6fa3b9b440e29cea88e7
Author: Jason Kölker <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Dec 22 14:26:51 2011 -0600

    Refactor Xen Vif drivers. Fixes LP907850
    
    * Allows Vif subclasses to have an __init__ for setting up state
    * Allows Vif subclasses to pass arbitrary kwargs to plug/unplug should
      they require more than what the interface specifies
    
    Change-Id: I816aa1537d21005d4332af3477d9fd12f177f326
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
